"The Avengers" is another thrilling adventure film that follows the story of several superheroes, including Iron Man (Robert Downey Jr.), Captain America (Chris Evans), Thor (Christopher Hemsworth), Black Widow (Scarlett Johansson), Hawkeye (Keanu Reeves), Ant-Man (Paul Rudd), and Doctor Strange (Oscar Isaac). After successfully completing numerous dangerous assignments for hire, the superheroes band together to form a superhero team called "The Avengers."
